children.name: IDEAS
children.description: You are brimming with ideas, you need a place to organize those ideas. Remember ideas are separate from thoughts

children.name: DOCS
children.description: The docs folder is to store your canonical source of truth. PRDs, MRDs and RFCs is what engineers and other stakeholder refer to for answers

children.name: PRD
children.description: PRD stands for Products Requirements Document.This is the document that clarifies the 5Ws of the product build

children.name: MRD
children.description: MRD stands for Market Requirements Document. This is the document that clearly lays out the Market Opportunity

children.name: RFC
children.description: RFC stands for Requests for comments. This document should answer the How in great detail. Think the tech spec.
